ai-ja421:1.2_0: compassionate, so very hard to heart,
ai-ja421:1.3_0: Then you rolled forth your wife
ai-ja421:2.1_0: the sun shines in the sun,
ai-ja421:2.3_0: Then you rolled forth your wife
ai-ja421:2.4_0: there is no way for you.”
ai-ja421:3.2_0: and offended me as if swelling me;
ai-ja421:4.1_0: “I saw the root of sensual pleasures,
ai-ja421:5.3_0: I’m going to be tossed by fools,
ai-ja421:6.4_0: who has gone forth passion for sensual pleasures?”
ai-ja421:7.2_0: One who wants to eat the water-pot, ~ who will not attend
ai-ja421:7.3_0: Mastered by the neck, he preserved on the Ganges
ai-ja421:8.1_0: “Has anyone seen (them), whose view is another,
ai-ja421:8.2_0: This result is the result of old age.
ai-ja421:8.4_0: We bow to your ministers and counselors.”
ai-ja421:9.3_0: This is the wrong way to cross over the sea.
ai-ja421:10.1_0: like the fifth sun (birth) in the mountain.
